name: Vegan Pumpkin French Toasts with Pumpkin Cornbread
description: Vegan Pumpkin French Toast with Pumpkin Cornbread, pumpkin pie spices and Caramelized Apples! Breakfast for fall. Vegan Soy-free Recipe. Can be gluten-free with gluten-free cornbread.
recipeIngredient: 7 to 8  thick slices of pumpkin cornbread or 6 to 7 thick slices of pumpkin cinnamon bread or other whole grain stale bread (see notes for links)
3/4 cup non dairy milk ( (almond milk, soy milk or coconut milk))
1 tbsp flour (, use rice flour to make gluten-free)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the ingredients under batter and let it sit for a few minutes while you heat up the skillet over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the ingredients under batter and let it sit for a few minutes while you heat up the skillet over medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Dip the slices in the batter for a few seconds, then place on the hot skillet (sprayed with oil for cast iron or no oil if using a good non stick). Cook for 4 to 5 minutes then flip and cook for another 3 to 4 or until golden brown on both sides. Serve with maple and vegan butter or some caramelized apples
recipeInstructions.name: Dip the slices in the batter for a few seconds, then place on the hot skillet (sprayed with oil for cast iron or no oil if using a good non stick). Cook for 4 to 5 minutes then flip and cook for another 3 to 4 or until golden brown on both sides. Serve with maple and vegan butter or some caramelized apples

recipeInstructions.text: Caramelized apples: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add apples, sugar, spices, water and a pinch of salt. Cook for 10 to 15 minutes or until the syrup thickens. Stir occasionally to avoid burning.
recipeInstructions.name: Caramelized apples: Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add apples, sugar, spices, water and a pinch of salt. Cook for 10 to 15 minutes or until the syrup thickens. Stir occasionally to avoid burning.
